product_name: ExOfficio Pisco Micro Plaid Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Start out on your traveling adventure in style with the wrinkle-resistant ExOfficio Pisco(TM) Micro Plaid Shirt. Polyester/modal fabric blend has an attractive drape and resists wrinkles to keep you looking sharp; also dries quickly. Critical seams are moved off of the shoulders to prevent rubbing under backpack straps. Single chest pocket stows a few small essentials. Closeout.
short_description: Start out on your traveling adventure in style with the wrinkle-resistant ExOfficio Pisco(TM) Micro Plaid Shirt.
